title: Day 26 - A Nice Place to Live & The Gift
itunes:title: Day 26 - A Nice Place to Live & The Gift
itunes:subtitle: The 31 Days of Horror 2022
description:
A Nice Place to Live

***

Written by: Chris Klavetter

***

The Gift

***

Written by: Cyndi Gradel and Narrated by: Rissa Montanez

***

Content Warnings: descriptions mutilation, child harm, possession, body horror

***

Tickets for the "Creepy" live show can be purchased at: https://bit.ly/BloodyFM

Check out our reward tiers at patreon.com/creepypod

***

***
